mapper.insert: insert into request(req_num, cus_num, free_num, reg_date, accept, acct_date) values(seq_req.nextval, #{cusNum}, #{freeNum}, sysdate, 'N', null)
insert into answer(req_num, ans_1, ans_2, ans_3) values(seq_req.currval, #{ans1}, #{ans2}, #{ans3})
mapper.select: select c.cus_num, r.req_num, r.free_num, r.reg_date, r.accept, c.name, a.ans_1, a.ans_2, a.ans_3 from customer c, request r, answer a where c.cus_num = r.cus_num and r.req_num = a.req_num and (r.accept is null or r.accept ='N') and r.free_num = #{freeNum} order by r.reg_date desc

select f.name, f.location, c.name cateName, r.req_num, r.reg_date, r.accept, a.ans_1, a.ans_2, a.ans_3, t.cus_num from freelancer f, categories c, answer a, request r, customer t where r.free_num = f.free_num and f.cate_num = c.cate_num and r.cus_num = t.cus_num and r.req_num = a.req_num and (r.accept is null or r.accept = 'N') and r.cus_num = #{cusNum} order by r.reg_date desc

select c.cus_num, r.req_num, r.free_num, r.reg_date, r.accept, c.name, a.ans_1, a.ans_2, a.ans_3 from customer c, request r, answer a where c.cus_num = r.cus_num and r.req_num = a.req_num and r.accept = 'Y' and r.free_num = #{freeNum} order by r.reg_date desc

select f.name, f.location, c.name cateName, r.req_num, r.reg_date, r.accept, a.ans_1, a.ans_2, a.ans_3, t.cus_num from freelancer f, categories c, answer a, request r, customer t where r.free_num = f.free_num and f.cate_num = c.cate_num and r.cus_num = t.cus_num and r.req_num = a.req_num and r.accept ='Y' and r.cus_num = #{cusNum} order by r.reg_date desc

select * from(select * from(select count(cate_num) m_count, cate_num from(select f.free_num, f.cate_num, c.name from request r, freelancer f, categories c where r.free_num = f.free_num and f.cate_num = c.cate_num) group by cate_num) a join categories b using(cate_num) order by m_count desc) where rownum < 5
